name: DANMAKU #1
description:
A short danmaku (bullet hell) game

Made for VTGameJam (VTuber Game Jam)

Made by
  • Luna (Code)
  • 40Nix (Music & SFX)
  • Kusamochi (Art)

Boss Design is based of the VTuber Kitsune Spirit

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Shoot

X - Use bomb

Left Shift - Focus mode (you move at half speed)

Known Issues
  • Currently the background renders incorrectly on some devices.
